## timeStampTo() function

时间戳转时分秒毫秒

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function timeStampTo(timeStamp: number, ms?: boolean): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  timeStamp | number | 时间戳 |
|  ms | boolean | _(Optional)_ 是否显示毫秒 |

**Returns:**
